Based on the user's preferences, I would recommend the movie "A Separate Peace" by John Knowles.
The movie tells the story of two roommates at a prep school in New England during World War II.
One roommate is a gentle giant who will defend the honor of his one true love to the end of his life, and beyond.
The other roommate is a no- good band of thugs who enter a quiet small town to unleash their terror.
Nothing could prepare them for the wrath of a gentle giant who would defend the honor of his one true love to the end of his life, and beyond.
A Separate Peace is a classic movie that tells an inspiring story about courage, determination, and the importance of treating others with respect and kindness.

The movie explores Alan Turing's personal life, his struggle with mental health issues, his relationship with his partner, and his eventual decision to publicly expose himself as a gay man.
